title: Basketball Scoreboard Plugin Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the Basketball Scoreboard plugin - displays live, recent, and upcoming NBA, WNBA, NCAA Men's, and NCAA Women's basketball games

enabled.description: Enable or disable the basketball scoreboard plugin

display_duration.description: Duration in seconds for the display controller to show this plugin mode before rotating to next plugin

live_priority.description: Enable live priority takeover when plugin has live content

high_performance_transitions.description: Use high-performance transitions (120 FPS) instead of standard (30 FPS)

update_interval.description: How often to fetch new data in seconds

enabled.description: Enable or disable transitions

game_display_duration.description: Duration in seconds to show each individual game before rotating to the next game within the same mode

dynamic_duration.title: Dynamic Duration Settings
dynamic_duration.description: Control whether the plugin shows all games before moving to the next mode. Can be configured globally or per-league/per-mode for granular control.

enabled.description: Global enable for dynamic duration. When enabled, the plugin will show each game once before moving to the next mode, overriding the normal display_duration setting. Can be overridden by per-league or per-mode settings.

max_duration_seconds.description: Global maximum time in seconds to wait for all games to be displayed. Can be overridden by per-league settings.

modes.title: Per-Mode Settings
modes.description: Configure dynamic duration for specific modes (live, recent, upcoming). These override global settings.

enabled.description: Enable dynamic duration for live games

max_duration_seconds.description: Max duration for live games (overrides global)

enabled.description: Enable dynamic duration for recent games

max_duration_seconds.description: Max duration for recent games (overrides global)

enabled.description: Enable dynamic duration for upcoming games

max_duration_seconds.description: Max duration for upcoming games (overrides global)

test_mode.description: Enable test mode with sample games

enabled.description: Enable NBA games

favorite_teams.description: List of favorite NBA team abbreviations (e.g., LAL, BOS, GSW). Use 2-3 letter codes.

display_modes.title: Display Modes
display_modes.description: Control which game types to show

live_priority.description: Give live games priority over other modes. When enabled, live games will interrupt the normal mode rotation and be displayed immediately when available.

live_game_duration.description: Duration in seconds to display each live game before rotating to the next live game

live_update_interval.description: How often to update live game data (seconds)

update_interval_seconds.description: How often to fetch new data (seconds)

game_limits.title: Game Limits
game_limits.description: Control how many games to show

recent_games_to_show.description: With favorite teams: Number of recent games PER team (e.g., 1 with 2 teams = 2 games). Without favorite teams: Total number of most recent games to show (e.g., 5 = show 5 most recent games total).

upcoming_games_to_show.description: With favorite teams: Number of upcoming games PER team (e.g., 2 with 3 teams = up to 6 games). Without favorite teams: Total number of next upcoming games to show (e.g., 1 = show only the next 1 game total).

show_favorite_teams_only.description: Only show games from favorite teams

show_all_live.description: Show all live games, not just favorites
